mapper.select:
select id, title, srchtype, type from ( select t1.id as id, t1.`name` as title, '文化活动' as srchtype, '1' as type, t1.ekey as ekey, t1.actsummary as doc from whg_act_activity t1 where t1.state = 6 and t1.delstate = 0 union select t2.id as id, t2. title as title, '培训驿站' as srchtype, '2' as type, t2.ekey as ekey, t2.coursedesc as doc from whg_tra t2 where t2.state = 6 and t2.delstate = 0 union select t3.id as id, t3.title as title, '场馆预定' as srchtype, '3' as type, t3.ekey as ekey, t3.summary as doc from whg_ven t3 where t3.state = 6 and t3.delstate = 0 union select t33.id as id, t33.title as title, '活动室' as srchtype, '33' as type, t33.ekey as ekey, t33.summary as doc from whg_ven_room t33 where t33.state = 6 and t33.delstate = 0 union select t4.clnfid as id, t4.clnftltle as title, '活动资讯' as srchtype, '4' as type, t4.clnfkey as ekey, t4.clnfintroduce as doc from wh_zx_colinfo t4 where t4.clnfstata = 3 and t4.clnftype = '2016111900000018' union select t5.id as id, t5.`name` as title, '文化品牌' as srchtype, '5' as type, '' as ekey, t5.shortname as doc from whg_ywi_whpp t5 where t5.state = 1 and t5.delstate = 0 union select t6.id as id, t6.`name` as title, '文化馆' as srchtype, '6' as type, '' as ekey, t6.introduction as doc from whg_sys_cult t6 where t6.state = 1 and t6.delstate = 0 UNION select t7.clnfid as id, t7.clnftltle as title, '资讯公告' as srchtype, '7' as type, t7.clnfkey as ekey, t7.clnfintroduce as doc from wh_zx_colinfo t7 where t7.clnfstata = 3 and t7.clnftype = '2016111900000014' UNION select t8.clnfid as id, t8.clnftltle as title, '资讯动态' as srchtype, '8' as type, t8.clnfkey as ekey, t8.clnfintroduce as doc from wh_zx_colinfo t8 where t8.clnfstata = 3 and t8.clnftype = '2016111900000002' UNION select t9.clnfid as id, t9.clnftltle as title, '培训公告' as srchtype, '9' as type, t9.clnfkey as ekey, t9.clnfintroduce as doc from wh_zx_colinfo t9 where t9.clnfstata = 3 and t9.clnftype = '2016111900000020' UNION select t10.clnfid as id, t10.clnftltle as title, '培训资讯' as srchtype, '10' as type, t10.clnfkey as ekey, t10.clnfintroduce as doc from wh_zx_colinfo t10 where t10.clnfstata = 3 and t10.clnftype = '2016111900000021' UNION select t11.clnfid as id, t11.clnftltle as title, '非遗公告' as srchtype, '11' as type, t11.clnfkey as ekey, t11.clnfintroduce as doc from wh_zx_colinfo t11 where t11.clnfstata = 3 and t11.clnftype = '2016112200000004' UNION select t12.clnfid as id, t12.clnftltle as title, '志愿资讯' as srchtype, '12' as type, t12.clnfkey as ekey, t12.clnfintroduce as doc from wh_zx_colinfo t12 where t12.clnfstata = 3 and t12.clnftype = '2016112200000009' UNION select t13.drscid as id, t13.drsctitle as title, '在线点播' as srchtype, '13' as type, '' as ekey, t13.drscintro as doc from wh_drsc t13 where t13.drscstate = 3 UNION select t14.zypxid as id, t14.zypxshorttitle as title, '志愿培训' as srchtype, '14' as type, t14.zypxkey as ekey, t14.zypxtitle as doc from wh_zypx t14 where t14.zypxstate = 3 UNION select t15.mlproid as id, t15.mlproshortitel as title, '名录项目' as srchtype, '15' as type, t15.mlprokey as ekey, t15.mlprotailtitle as doc from wh_decproject t15 where t15.mlprostate = 6 ) t
where t.title like #{srchkey} OR t.ekey like #{srchkey} OR t.doc like #{srchkey} OR t.ekey in (select id FROM whg_ywi_key where name like #{srchkey})
